procedure.indication: lumbar spinal stenosis L4/5 with severe canal compromise
procedure.notes: Demo spec for MIS lumbar decompression (L4/5) with a higher-cost, robot-integrated concept.

tech_concept.name: Robotic Navigated Decompression Platform
tech_concept.description: Robotic arm + navigation platform providing constrained decompression envelopes and guided resection trajectories.
